description: Proficient in JavaScript and related technologies such as Node.js and React.

Skilled in building fast and dynamic web applications using Next.js and related technologies such as React and GraphQL.
Proficient in using .NET Framework for REST API applications development.
Experienced in writing maintainable and scalable code using C# language for web applications.
Skilled in writing and running tests using Jest for JavaScript applications.
Proficient in using Cypress for end-to-end testing of web applications.
Experienced in building scalable and efficient server-side applications using Express and related technologies such as Node.js and MongoDB.
Proficient in using MongoDB for data storage and management in web applications.

Experienced in using MediatR for implementing the mediator pattern in .NET applications.
Proficient in using Git for version control in software development projects.
Experienced in implementing CI/CD pipelines for automating software deployment and delivery.

Experienced in using Mock Service Worker for mocking API endpoints during development and testing of web applications, reducing the dependency on real backend services.
